mema wyapara parani sanwidhana thulin siduwiya nohaki athara eya siduwiya hakke eewata erehi karallakini - sasapa wisin deshapalanikawa sudanam kara sanwidhanathmakawa meheyawanu labana karallak - aluth nama lesa samajawadi samanatha pakshaya yodaganu labuwe, samaja pa්rajathantha්rawadaya, stalinwadaya ha pablowadaya wisin dashaka gananawak thisse samajawadaya yana padaya dushpariharanaya kirima magin durawabodha bawata path keri thibu, samajawadaye sarabhutha aramuna wana samaja asamanathawaya duribhutha kirima matha awadhanaya yomu kirima sadaha jathyanthara kamituwa thula karana lada pulul sakachchawalin anathuruwaya. 1996 siya idiri darshana liyawilla thula sasapa pahatha nigamanaya kara elambauni: "kamkaru panthiya ha piditha janathawan, siyalu parani pakshawalata ha niladhari thantha්rayanta dakwana sambandhathawaya wenaswi athi bawa handuna ganimen illa sitinne, janathawange elambaena wiplawawadi aragalayanhi nayakathwaya jathyanthara kamituwe shakhawan wisin gatha yuthu bawatayi.”
